rComments: TANDY BEAL IS ONE OF THE BEST TEACHERS I HAVE EVER LEARNED FROM, outside or inside class. I can't even tell you. I took a class where we went to a third grade class and taught. I was super nervous but she helped us all build the confidence to teach. Tandy's class is what I will remember from school! She's basically a legend, and shes super gracious

Tandy's a wonderful person, but there is way too much homework for a lower div, so don't take it unless you need it. Her instructions are NEVER clear and she isn't at all understanding when students miss class for legit reasons. My friend missed class to go to her grandmother's funeral, and Tandy still marked her down by a full letter grade.
I love Tandy, she always makes you feel good. But I feel like if you are not a good dancer then you cannot get an A, I did everything in that class and got an A-

So this whole class was centered around one big project: we had to hold several hour long interviews with elderly people in the santa cruz area, film it, and then edit the footage all together. I was loads of work, but a lot of people got a lot out of it. Tandy is hilarious and a lot of fun. She reminds me of professor Trelawney from Harry Potter.

WOW... what can I say about this woman, she reminds me of Professor Trelawney from Harry Potter. She is absolutely crazy, hilarious, and so much fun. She made the whole class walk slow motion through campus and do all sorts of craziness, but you get used to it. A big documentary project which takes up A LOT of time, but I learned a lot

Intro to modern got me really excited at first, since I LOVE dance, but after the first month it got to be really repetitive. We had a significant amount of out of the class room work, which got us into the community. She is an AMAZING dance with an immense amount of talent but she seems to have trouble teaching student with little to no dance expe

Not only a wonderful teacher, but an amazing person! Great class; learn about themes of life, a lot of self reflection. Do the H.W. when assigned and get interviews done early to prevent glitches. Offer your opinion in class. Tandy truly cares for her students and opens the eyes to the world :)

Tandy is a great and enthusiastic intstructor. There is a significant amount of outside of class work required. 1 performance, 3 dance classes,2 in class projects. If you are enthusiastic about improving, follow Tandy's instructions and show up on time this will be a great class.
She is so delighful and so amazing! she has lived quite the life and has so many amazing stories to tell! She really cares about her students and is totally a free spirit! We all loved her!

Beg. Modern Dance was a really easy class, although I often felt bored because we did the same thing everyday. I didn't feel like there was a lot of progression and kept wanting to learn something new. Overall, though, Tandy is a very nice woman, just a little frazzled and disorganized sometimes. You'll have to do a couple group projects & papers.
Tandy Beal was GREAT!!!! Such a sweet, kind, supportive, ENTHUSIASTIC woman with a love of dance that she shared with the entire class! Couldn't be happier with her :)

Tandy is AMAZING!! She does incredible things, and I look up to her in every respect. She's so full of life and energy. Very dramatic and wonderful. I recommend her completely! Her energy filled her beyond capacity and spilled over onto her students! She's that great!
Tandy is an inspiration, but you might have to prove to her your level of creative mojo before she starts taking you seriously.

Tandy is an inspiration!!! the class was very meaningful, every study got to help teach a public elementary class movements as expressions. we put together a great show at the end. it's offered usually Winter quarter. The show is called "listening to the earth," and it's just AMAZINGG!!!

very easy class if you show up on time and show up every class; she is an awesome and talented teacher; there were days that i didnt want to be there b/c i had to study for other classes, but overall it was a good class; and it's an easy grade and easy GE (A)
I felt silly the whole class... embody blue...

Tandy was awesome. I took the intro class even though I had more than enough years of modern under my belt. My previous dance teachers love her, I loved her. She made me challenge a lot of techniques I have already learned, and at the same time strengthene

This was the most memorable class that i have taken at UCSC. Tandy's pursuit for an improved quality of life is infectious and inspiring. I recommend this class to those that like to be inspired and that are willing to push their boundaries into a world of movement.

I took intro to Modern dance with Tandy, and she is awesome! IT was a fun class, and not hard compared to other classes that give you all these reading to do. This is a good class to take if you need a break from all that reading. I higly recommend taking a class with Tandy Beal!
An inspiration to all inspiring artists.  An amazing educator as well!  The more you put into her courses they more invaluable resourses you will receive.

Arts Education in the Community was a great class, definately easy for the two GE's it satisfies. You get to work with adorable children and explore dance, even if you're just a beginner. Tandy is really involved and very approachable.
